| [a](/wiki/Repeat_previous_command "Repeat previous command") |                                        | [c](/wiki/Quit "Quit")         |                                        |                            | [d](/wiki/Kick "Kick")                         |                        | [o](/wiki/Overview "Overview")       |                            | [p](/wiki/Repeat_previous_messages "Repeat previous messages") |                                                                                               | [r](/wiki/Redraw_screen "Redraw screen") |                                | [t](/wiki/Teleportation "Teleportation") |                                                                                               |                                                                                         | [\[](/wiki/Esc "Esc")                                            |                                                | [Ctrl]()                                                          |                                                                    |                                                            |   |

There are several commands in NetHack that use [Ctrl]() key. [Ctrl]() key allows sending some non-printable characters to NetHack. The Mac port uses Apple.

## Commands that use Ctrl

- Press [Ctrl]() + [t](/wiki/T "T") to [teleport](/wiki/Teleport "Teleport").
- Press [Ctrl]() + [d](/wiki/D "D") to [kick](/wiki/Kick "Kick") something.
- Press [Ctrl]() + [a](/wiki/A "A") to redo the previous command.
- Press [Ctrl]() + [p](/wiki/P "P") to repeat previous messages.
- Press [Ctrl]() + [c](/wiki/C "C") to [quit](/wiki/Quit "Quit") game.
- Press [Ctrl]() + [r](/wiki/R "R") to [redraw screen](/wiki/Redraw_screen "Redraw screen").
- Press [Ctrl]() + [x](/wiki/X "X") to show your attributes.
- Press [Ctrl]() + [z](/wiki/Z "Z") to [suspend](/wiki/Shell_escape "Shell escape") NetHack. (tty version only)
- Pressing [Ctrl]() + [\[](/wiki/Left_square_bracket "Left square bracket") or [Ctrl]() + [@](/wiki/@ "@") is equivalent to pressing [ESC](/wiki/ESC "ESC") key (cancels commands).
- Pressing [Ctrl]() with [direction](/wiki/Direction "Direction") key will move that direction until you are near something.

## Wizard mode

Several commands are available only in [Wizard mode](/wiki/Wizard_mode "Wizard mode").

- Press [Ctrl]() + [e](/wiki/E "E") to [search](/wiki/Search "Search") a room.
- Press [Ctrl]() + [f](/wiki/F "F") to [map](/wiki/Magic_mapping "Magic mapping") the level.
- Press [Ctrl]() + [g](/wiki/G "G") to [create monster](/wiki/Create_monster "Create monster").
- Press [Ctrl]() + [i](/wiki/I "I") to [identify](/wiki/Identify "Identify") all your items.
- Press [Ctrl]() + [o](/wiki/O "O") to show locations of [special levels](/wiki/Special_level "Special level").
- Press [Ctrl]() + [v](/wiki/V "V") to [levelport](/wiki/Levelport "Levelport") (pressing [?](/wiki/%3F "?") will show you menu with special levels).
- Press [Ctrl]() + [w](/wiki/W "W") to [wish](/wiki/Wish "Wish") for an object.
- Press [Ctrl]() + [x](/wiki/X "X") to show your [attributes](/wiki/Attributes "Attributes") and [intrinsics](/wiki/Intrinsic "Intrinsic").

## Other

- [Ctrl]() + [m](/wiki/M "M") acts in a same way as [Ctrl]() + [j](/wiki/J "J")
- [Ctrl]() + [s](/wiki/S "S") and [Ctrl]() + [q](/wiki/Q "Q") are sometimes used to pause and resume terminal output (tty version only). If NetHacks seems to stop responding, try pressing [Ctrl]() + [q](/wiki/Q "Q"), especially if you use Screen program.

Ctrl

Wikipedia has an article about:
Ctrl
Keyboard commands
~ ! @ # $ % ^ & * ( ) _ = +
Q W E R T Y U I O P { } |
q w e r t y u i o p [ ] \
A S D F G H J K L : "
a s d f g h j k l ; '
Z X C V B N M < > ?
z x c v b n m , . /
q w e r t u i o p Alt
a s d f j l Alt
c v n m ? Alt
A C R T O Alt
a c d o p r t [ Ctrl

There are several commands in NetHack that use Ctrl key. Ctrl key allows sending some non-printable characters to NetHack. The Mac port uses Apple.

Commands that use Ctrl

  • Press Ctrl + t to teleport.
  • Press Ctrl + d to kick something.
  • Press Ctrl + a to redo the previous command.
  • Press Ctrl + p to repeat previous messages.
  • Press Ctrl + c to quit game.
  • Press Ctrl + r to redraw screen.
  • Press Ctrl + x to show your attributes.
  • Press Ctrl + z to suspend NetHack. (tty version only)
  • Pressing Ctrl + [ or Ctrl + @ is equivalent to pressing ESC key (cancels commands).
  • Pressing Ctrl with direction key will move that direction until you are near something.

Wizard mode

Several commands are available only in Wizard mode.

  • Press Ctrl + e to search a room.
  • Press Ctrl + f to map the level.
  • Press Ctrl + g to create monster.
  • Press Ctrl + i to identify all your items.
  • Press Ctrl + o to show locations of special levels.
  • Press Ctrl + v to levelport (pressing ? will show you menu with special levels).
  • Press Ctrl + w to wish for an object.
  • Press Ctrl + x to show your attributes and intrinsics.

Other

  • Ctrl + m acts in a same way as Ctrl + j
  • Ctrl + s and Ctrl + q are sometimes used to pause and resume terminal output (tty version only). If NetHacks seems to stop responding, try pressing Ctrl + q, especially if you use Screen program.

rawPage:
{{wikipedia|Ctrl}}
{{Keyboard Commands}}
There are several commands in NetHack that use {{kbd|Ctrl}} key. {{kbd|Ctrl}} key allows sending some non-printable characters to NetHack. The Mac port uses {{kbd|Apple|link=0}}.

==Commands that use Ctrl==
*Press {{kbd|Ctrl|t}} to [[teleport]].
*Press {{kbd|Ctrl|d}} to [[kick]] something.
*Press {{kbd|Ctrl|a}} to redo the previous command.
*Press {{kbd|Ctrl|p}} to repeat previous messages.
*Press {{kbd|Ctrl|c}} to [[quit]] game.
*Press {{kbd|Ctrl|r}} to [[redraw screen]].
*Press {{kbd|Ctrl|x}} to show your attributes.
*Press {{kbd|Ctrl|z}} to [[Shell escape|suspend]] NetHack. (tty version only)
*Pressing {{kbd|Ctrl|[}} or {{kbd|Ctrl|@}} is equivalent to pressing {{kbd|ESC}} key (cancels commands).
*Pressing {{kbd|Ctrl}} with [[direction]] key will move that direction until you are near something.

==Wizard mode==

Several commands are available only in [[Wizard mode]].
*Press {{kbd|Ctrl|e}} to [[search]] a room.
*Press {{kbd|Ctrl|f}} to [[Magic mapping|map]] the level.
*Press {{kbd|Ctrl|g}} to [[create monster]].
*Press {{kbd|Ctrl|i}} to [[identify]] all your items.
*Press {{kbd|Ctrl|o}} to show locations of [[Special level|special levels]].
*Press {{kbd|Ctrl|v}} to [[levelport]] (pressing {{kbd|?}} will show you menu with special levels).
*Press {{kbd|Ctrl|w}} to [[wish]] for an object.
*Press {{kbd|Ctrl|x}} to show your [[attributes]] and [[Intrinsic|intrinsics]].

==Other==

*{{kbd|Ctrl|m}} acts in a same way as {{kbd|Ctrl|j}} 
*{{kbd|Ctrl|s}} and {{kbd|Ctrl|q}} are sometimes used to pause and resume terminal output (tty version only). If NetHacks seems to stop responding, try pressing {{kbd|Ctrl|q}}, especially if you use Screen program.

[[Category:User interface]]
